arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(szGroup)

-- Enable reward chest
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_CHEST, false)

end

function Start()

-- If the player didn't kill the shrine monster it goes into a death state
-- Shrine monster covers the shrine making it unuseable
	if bBonusAchieved == false then
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idShrineCorruptionMonster) then
			Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idShrineCorruptionMonster, S_ANIMKEY_DEAD, S_ANIMKEY_DEADPOSE)
			Hydra.RemoveBuffs(idShrineCorruptionMonster, S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Shrine_Protection")
			Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idShrineCorruptionMonster, true) 
			Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idShrineCorruptionMonster, false)
			Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "ChannelingEnded", idShrineCorruptionMonster)
			bMonsterChannelComplete = true 
		end
-- If the shrine monster is dead spawn and elite and activate the shrine	
	else
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(ID_ELITE_SPAWNER) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_ELITE_SPAWNER, false)
		end
	end

-- Disable remaining spawners.
	for i, idSpawner in ipairs(T_ALL_SPAWNERS) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, true)
		end
	end

-- Stop any remaining sorcerers from channeling
	local tSorcererGroup = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_SORCERERS_GROUP)
	
	for i, idSorcerer in ipairs(tSorcererGroup) do	
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSorcerer) then
			Hydra.BuffRemove(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Channeling", idSorcerer)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idSorcerer, true)
		end
	end

end

function Start(flTimeElapsed)


if bRespawnTimer == false then
	if Hydra.BuffIsOnActor(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Shrine_Protection", idShrineCorruptionMonster) == false then
		Hydra.EventSend("SORCERER_SPAWNING")
		bRespawnTimer = true
	end
end


end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

-- Define time window of which the shrine is vulnerable.  
	local flRespawnTime = Hydra.GetRandomFloat(FL_SORCERER_RESPAWN_MINTIME, FL_SORCERER_RESPAWN_MAXTIME)

-- Wait the specified amount of time 
	Hydra.Wait(flRespawnTime) 
	
-- Spawn the next set of sorcerers
	for i, spawner in pairs(T_SORC_SPAWNERS) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(spawner) then 
			Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(spawner)
		end
	end

end

function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)

-- If the sorcerer has the channeling buff set up a distance check
-- If the sorcerer has been pushed to far away from the shrine monster remove the buff and activate AI
	if Hydra.BuffIsOnActor(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Channeling", idActorDamaged) then

		local N_POSITION_RANGE = 6
		local N_POSITION_RANGE_SQ = math.pow(N_POSITION_RANGE, 2)
		local nSorcererVsShrinePosition = Hydra.ActorDistanceSquaredBetweenActors(idActorDamaged, idShrineCorruptionMonster)

		if nSorcererVsShrinePosition >= N_POSITION_RANGE_SQ then
			Hydra.BuffRemove(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Channeling", idActorDamaged)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorDamaged, true)
		end
	end

end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	
	-- If the shrine monster is alive corrupt any spawning goatmen
	if bBonusAchieved == false then
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtTarget(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawned, S_INFECTION_ON_SPAWN, true)
	end
	
end

-- Enable spawners
for i, idSpawner in ipairs(T_ALL_SPAWNERS) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idSpawner, false)
	end
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)
	-- When a sorcerer spawns give it the correct power if the shrine monster is still alive.
	UF_SorcererTargetShrine(idActorSpawned, idShrineCorruptionMonster)

end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

-- Setting the closing animation here so it doesn't trigger 3 times each time the sorcerers spawn
	Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idShrineCorruptionMonster, S_ANIMKEY_CLOSING, S_ANIMKEY_NEUTRAL) 

end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
-- Setting bonus variable
	bBonusAchieved = true 

-- Sets the DRLG designer variable so the chest encounter spawns the correct one.
	Hydra.SetGameVariableNumeric("DE_ChestRewardRare", 1)

-- Playing a cleansing effect on the shrine and the monsters.
-- Also removing the infection buff.
Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_SHRINE, VFX_CLEANSING_SHOCKWAVE)

local tMonsters = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_MONSTERS_GROUP)

for i, idMonster in ipairs(tMonsters) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idMonster) then
		Hydra.RemoveBuffs(idMonster, S_INFECTION_ON_SPAWN)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idMonster, VFX_CLEANSING_PULSE)
	end
end

-- Small pause before enabling the shrine so the player doesn't 
-- accidentally click it when killing the shrine monster
Hydra.Wait(1)
Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_SHRINE, false)

unk_c47e01a:
---------------------------------------
-- Sorcerer and Shrine Monster Setup --
function UF_SorcererTargetShrine(idSorcerer, idShrine)

-- Disable Sorcerer AI, attach vfx rope to shrine monster, buff the shrine monster and close it up
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idShrine) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idShrine) then
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idSorcerer, false)
		Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idSorcerer, S_ANIMKEY_SORCERER_CHANNEL_INTRO, S_ANIMKEY_SORCERER_CHANNEL_LOOP)
		Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Shrine_Protection", idShrine)
		Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "Channeling", idSorcerer)
		Hydra.EventSend("SHRINE_CLOSED")
		bRespawnTimer = false
	end
end
unk_993f312:
-- ======= CONSTANTS =======
--	General
	FL_SORCERER_RESPAWN_MINTIME = 3.0 -- the minimum amount of time the shrine can be exposed/vulnerable
	FL_SORCERER_RESPAWN_MAXTIME = 5.0 -- the maximum amount of time the shrine can be exposed/vulnerable
	

-- ======= VARIABLES =======

--	BonusTracker
	bBonusAchieved = false
--  Checking if the respawn timer for the sorcerers has been triggered
	bRespawnTimer = false


-- ======= Initial Setup =======

-- Giving the starting sorceres a power for channeling on the shrine
for i, idStartingSorcerer in ipairs(tStartingMonsters) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idStartingSorcerer) then
		UF_SorcererTargetShrine(idStartingSorcerer, idShrineCorruptionMonster)
	end
end


-- Disabling the shrine under the corruption and giving it the "bloody" look
Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_SHRINE, true)
Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_SORCERER_CHANNELING, "BloodyLook", ID_SHRINE)
